ctx: O suši in denarju – in nasprotno
content: Cajt je za veliko pucanje živih mrtvakov.
author: ogo

ctx: O suši in denarju – in nasprotno
content:
"Everyone is bearish but no one has sold" - for every $100 of
inflows since January 2021, just $2 have flowed out from tech
stocks and $3 exited from equities overall


www.bloomberg.com/ne...ium-europe
author: crt
